segments.text: I want to start a tradition of family vacations with our family right now before we have kids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to make sure it's good solid habit before anything else takes its place , like work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , so this year we are going to take our first family vacation , just you and I .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And where are we going to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are we going all out or just starting with a mini family vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go all out if we can afford it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was looking in this magazine the other day and cruises are not very expensive at all . Take a look at this !
segments.speaker: S2
